Name: Butternut Squash (PH)
SeedDescription: Plant these in the fall. Takes 12 days to mature and produces a long squash.

SeedDescriptionLocalization.es: Plant these in the fall. Takes 12 days to mature and produces a long squash.
SeedDescriptionLocalization.ko: Plant these in the fall. Takes 12 days to mature and produces a long squash.
SeedDescriptionLocalization.de: Pflanze sie im Herbst. Wächst in 12 Tagen heran.

SeedDescriptionLocalization.ru: Сажайте осенью. Через 12 дней вырастает удлиненная тыква, похожая на кабачок.

SeedDescriptionLocalization.zh: 秋天种植。 奶油南瓜需要12天才能成熟，长成一个长长的奶油南瓜。
